list.text: Hello [player_name]! Welcome in the awesome world of Spectral Frontiers! You are going to discover a world filled with darkness, betrayals and epic battles. You will not be alone to face all the challenges the world keeps secret!

The game is designed to be used with a keyboard, not a gamepad. Most things need to be clicked with your mouse, but if you don't understand something or if you just want to leave a comment, please do it on our official website, via the contact page, many thanks and enjoy the game!
